title: Hero Section Data
description: Schema for the data structure of the hero section.

introduction.description: The main introductory text (e.g., 'I'm Karol Jaro≈Ñ').

goalsDescription.description: Text describing goals or mission. May contain markdown-like syntax for highlighting (**text**).

projectButtonLabel.description: The label for the button linking to the projects section.

socialButtons.description: An array containing data for social media links/buttons.

technologiesList.description: An array containing data for technologies displayed in the carousel.

socialButton.title: Social Button
socialButton.description: Data structure for a single social link/button.

name.description: The display name for the social link (e.g., 'GitHub', 'LinkedIn').

url.description: The URL for the social profile.

icon.description: The name/identifier for the icon associated with the link (e.g., 'static_Lucide:github').

technologyItem.title: Technology Item
technologyItem.description: Data structure for a single technology shown in the carousel.

name.description: The display name of the technology (e.g., 'Nuxt.js', 'Vue').

url.description: The URL linking to the technology's website.
